mapper.update: update sys_user set createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isAdmin = #{isAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, disabled = #{disabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realName = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginName = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, createTime, email, isAdmin, disabled, password, realName, loginName, updateTime from sys_user
